l10n.requiresCompletionWarning: You need to answer all the questions correctly before continuing.
l10n.endcardInformation: You have answered @answered questions, click below to submit your answers.
l10n.endcardInformationNoAnswers: You have not answered any questions.
l10n.endcardInformationMustHaveAnswer: You have to answer at least one question before you can submit your answers.
l10n.endCardTableRowSummaryWithScore: You got @score out of @total points for the @question that appeared after @minutes minutes and @seconds seconds.
l10n.endCardTableRowSummaryWithoutScore: You have answered the @question that appeared after @minutes minutes and @seconds seconds.
l10n.howToCreateInteractions: Play the video to start creating interactions

l10n.fullScoreButnoLivesLeft: You have achieved full score, but lost all your lifes!
l10n.fullScoreButTimeout: You have achieved full score, but ran out of time!
l10n.confirmFinishDialog: If you finish now, you will not be able to explore the map any longer.
l10n.confirmFinishDialogQuestion: Do you really want to finish the map?
l10n.confirmAccessDeniedDialog: This stage requires you to meet some goals before it can be opened.
l10n.confirmGameOverDialog: You have lost all your lives. Please try again!
l10n.confirmGameOverDialogTimeout: You have run out of time. Please try again!
l10n.confirmTimeoutDialogLostLife: You ran out of time and lost a life.
l10n.confirmIncompleteScoreDialogLostLife: You did not achieve full score and lost a life.
l10n.confirmFullScoreDialog: You have collected enough points to finish this map with a full score, but you are free to explore the rest if you wish to. Your score will be submitted once you finish the map.
l10n.confirmFullScoreDialogLoseLivesAmendmend: But beware! You may still lose lives!
l10n.noStages: No valid stages were set for the map.
l10n.restrictionsAllOfLong: The stage will not be available unless:
l10n.restrictionsAnyOfLong: The stage will not be available unless any of:
l10n.restrictionTotalScoreLessThan: You have a total score less than @value.
l10n.restrictionTotalScoreEqualTo: You have a total score equal to @value.
l10n.restrictionTotalScoreNotEqualTo: You have a total score not equal to @value.
l10n.restrictionTotalScoreGreaterThan: You have a total score greater than @value.
l10n.restrictionStageScoreLessThan: You have a score less than @value in stage @label.
l10n.restrictionStageScoreEqualTo: You have a score equal to @value in stage @label.
l10n.restrictionStageScoreNotEqualTo: You have a score not equal to @value in stage @label.
l10n.restrictionStageScoreGreaterThan: You have a score greater than @value in stage @label.
l10n.restrictionStageProgressIsNot: Ths progress of stage @label is not @value.
l10n.missingContent: No content was set for this stage!

a11y.mapSolutionsWasOpened: The map was opened in solutions mode.
a11y.applicationInstructions: Use space or enter key to activate current stage. Use arrow keys to select adjacent stage. Use space or enter key on adjacent stage to navigate there.
